Capstone Portfolio Documentation
================================

Welcome to the technical reference for the Capstone Portfolio Django project.
This guide is designed for engineers and operators who need insight into the
architecture, deployment, and extension points that make the application
production ready.

.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 2
   :caption: Contents

   quickstart
   architecture
   reference/portfolio
   reference/settings
